name: floatabs
description: This function returns the absolute value of float.

params_body.name: Float:value
params_body.description: The float value to get the absolute value of.

return_values: The absolute value of the float (as a float value).
pawn_code:
floatabs(47.0); // This will return 47.0.
floatabs(-47.0); // This will return the same.
